name: KindergARTen (itch) (benskca)
description:
It’s your first day at a prestigious kindergarten for gifted toddlers who’ve shown exceptional talent in art. The pressure’s on, and your teacher has some unconventional methods…

In KindergARTen you are presented with a painting every 10 seconds. You have to do your best to copy the painting you’ve been shown before time runs out and the next painting arrives. Nothing less than perfection is expected - do you have what it takes?

The game is controlled entirely with the mouse. There is an in-game tutorial that plays on start-up to help you get the hang of the controls. Enjoy!
